```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
owid_co2_data<- read_csv("../data/owid-co2-data.csv")
```

```{r}
CO2_data <- owid_co2_data
```


```{r}
Our_co2_dataset <- owid_co2_data %>% 
  select("country", "year", "population", "co2", "co2_per_capita", "iso_code")
```

```{r}
library("rnaturalearth")
library("rnaturalearthdata")
library("gganimate")

world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")
class(world)

## [1] "sf"  
## [1] "data.frame"
```

```{r}
names(world)[10] <- "iso_code"


all_countries <- Our_co2_dataset %>%
  expand(iso_code, year)


CO2_complete <- left_join(all_countries, Our_co2_dataset, by = c("iso_code", "year"))
```


```{r}
merged_data <- full_join(world, CO2_complete, by = c("iso_code"))
```



```{r}
merged_data %>% 
  filter(year == 2020) %>% 
ggplot(aes(fill = co2_per_capita)) +
    geom_sf() +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "blue", high ="red") +
  theme_void()
  #transition_time(year)
  #transition_reveal(time = year)
```
```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = merged_data, aes(fill = co2_per_capita)) +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "blue", high = "red") +
  theme_void() +
  transition_time(year) +
  labs(title = "Year: {frame_time}")
```

```{r}
my_map <- ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = merged_data, aes(fill = co2)) +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "blue", high = "red") +
  theme_void()
```

```{r}
my_anim_map <- my_map +
  transition_time(year) +
  labs(title = "Year: {frame_time}")
```
